#summary stdlib for AS3.

== Introduction ==

*stdlib* is the general purpose standard library in C, look at [http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Stdlib.h stdlib.h].


== API ==

*package* C.stdlib

*constants*
 * `EXIT_SUCCESS:int`
 * `EXIT_FAILURE:int`

*functions*
 * `abort():void`
 * `exit( status:int = -1 ):void`
 * `getenv( name:String ):String`
 * `setenv( name:String, value:String, overwrite:Boolean = false ):int`
 * `unsetenv( name:String ):int`
 * `realpath( path:String ):String`
 * `system( command:String ):int`
